text: Hi all I have a headache with some windows 10 AD joined managed laptops that have been all of sudden upgraded to Windows 11 Insider Preview builds. From initial investigation it looks like a block on previous GP for windows 11 build expired and for some other reason a policy with insider preview was enabled. My question is, has anyway had experience with this and what is the easiest path to get them onto Windows 11 stable builds? Fortunately it’s only 3-4 laptops and we have blocked the rest. From what I can work out unenrolling the devices when next version of Windows releases it the only safe way, otherwise it appears a rebuild is required? Any suggestions would be greatly appreciated. Thanks -- %40TYUPR06MB5978.apcprd06.prod.outlook.com
